name: Ninja Cat 2 - Platformer Game (Mobile-friendly)
description:
Use your Ninja Skills to help Scratch Cat fight enemy rats, solve puzzles, and find fish to eat!

CONTROLS (Keyboard):

WASD / arrow keys - move, jump, climb, push

SPACE - interact or attack

R - reset the level

M - return to main menu

CONTROLS (Mobile):

Press your finger above/left/right of the cat to move, jump, or climb walls.

Tap directly on (or nearby) the cat to interact or attack.
